purpose: The email announces three upcoming full-time faculty positions in the Computer Science department at UCLouvain, Belgium, targeting candidates in software engineering and security. It encourages recipients to forward the information to high-profile candidates seeking permanent positions at a top university. The email provides details about the positions, the work environment, and application procedures.
evidence_sentences: The Computer Science department at UCLouvain (Belgium) will soon open three full-time faculty positions targeting excellent profiles in the following domains.
Positions 1 and 2, in one or more of these areas: Software engineering, Programming systems and languages, Software dependability, including formal methods.
Position 3, in software security and cybersecurity, also broadly construed.
We expect vacancies to be announced on the UCLouvain job portal in early September, with a deadline a few weeks later for a standard application package.
